title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Towel Collection at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Luxurious comfort for the modern home, the Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Towel Collection is uniquely designed from combed cotton for a super plush look and sumptuously soft feel. These long-lasting towels are finished with a contemporary textured trim. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/product.asp?SKU=204148
Luxurious comfort for the modern home, the Kenneth Cole Reaction Home Towel Collection is uniquely designed from combed cotton for a super plush look and sumptuously soft feel. These long-lasting towels are finished with a contemporary textured trim. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: Exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond the Kenneth Cole reaction home bath towel collection colors were inspired by items in his collection. This collection is rendered in zero twist luxurious 100 percent combed cotton terry pile. These premium high performance cotton yarns give it a dense extra soft superior hand that is easy care. Each is finished with a tailored doppy at the hem. The bath towels are generously sized, the towels are fade resistant which helps the colors remain as vibrant as new wash after wash the Kenneth Cole reaction home bath towels are part of the Kenneth Cole reaction home collection. They're available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
